location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 479: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Commodore John Patterson Porter, Commander of the Indian Naval Squadron in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: This is a letter in response to John Patterson Porter's letter of 16 December 1850, regarding the punishment of the sirbaz [foot soldier] who assaulted Porter's servant.
